field.output: The HTML Email Rule requires the SM HTML Email Solution which is missing from this system. This solution is optional content that can be downloaded from HP Live Network at http://www.hp.com/go/livenetwork from the Service Manager Standard Content section. Inform your System Administrator to enable this feature.
